name: Choices: And The Sun Went Out
name_original: Choices: And The Sun Went Out
description:
CHOICES is a collection of exciting choice-based adventure stories with a difference - new content is delivered weekly. No one player can discover the entire story in a single play through. See how many other players travelled to the same place as you each time you conclude a story arc.

Subscribe for full access to our current catalog and receive weekly updates to all our interactive stories.

The first part of each adventure is free.

Are you ready?

** OUR STORIES **

ADVENTURE 1: And The Sun Went Out

What if the sun inexplicably vanished only to return hours later? Investigate with your AI companion, Moti. Uncover conspiracies. Discover ancient religions. Travel the globe.

Find out who is murdering scientists and what this has to do with the random disappearances of the sun. This is your journey, and only your choices can expose the truth.

ADVENTURE 2: And Their Souls Were Eaten

You have a gift. With your gift, the dead are never truly gone.

But what if there is a dark side to your gift? What if there are those who can pervert your talent, and alter the balance of life and death?

Travel across a steampunk 1830s Europe, where metal is magical, giving powers to those who wear it. Learn more about your ancient gift and what it means for you, your family, and humanity. Uncover the nefarious plot to destroy all life... and fight against time to stop your enemy from destroying everything you hold dear.

** COMPATIBLE WITH APPLE WATCH **

If you have an Apple Watch, you may use it as a companion device to communicate with the avatars in your adventures.

** HOW IT WORKS **

"What’s really innovative about Choices...unlike traditional gamebooks that have a definite end, Choices: And the Sun Went Out is a continuing gamebook that will be updated weekly, allowing you to progress through the story over time. As you make choices in your story, it will advance in ways completely differently than other readers when weekly content is added." - PocketTactics.com

Continue your adventures by subscribing through the app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a price according to your country. For reference, in the US, the prices are US$1 for the monthly, US$2 for the 3-monthly, and US$3 for the 6-monthly. The local price will be confirmed in the app before you complete the payment.

Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current 1, 3 or 6 month periods. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
